page.title: 02General Introduction 2
page.content: There are plenty of{schools}to go to. There are four schools, they are:-Pickering Infants,Pickering Juniors,Lady Lumley's school and St. Joseph's Catholic Primary school. I like some of the shops and the{cinema} . I wish we had more fashion shops. I like the town because there is a B.M.X. course and a club where I can go and play pool. I wish the town had a sports centre. My house is in West Carr Lane and nearly every night I go up to Keld Head Springs to feed the ducks that live there. I do not like going to the town because it takes 20mins. to get there and 20mins. to get back.
